markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Extend Pseudopod](/Actions.aspx?ID=1652) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 107 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your chair lengthens itself, granting its pseudopod Strike the [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) trait until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Extend Pseudopod
